tag_list: bruce-oliver, bruce-l-oliver, cruise-with-bruce, travel-internet-radio-host, photographer, entrepreneur, internet-developer, webmaster, travel-writer
overview:
Bruce Oliver is a travel photo-journalist and radio host of Cruise with Bruce Show on the Cruise Radio Network.

He is listed in Marquis Who’s Who in America and Who’s Who in the World. He’s a native New Englander who has traveled and cruised all over the world. For more information visit his website at: http://BruceLOliver.com
